# Cure Light Wounds, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Cleric Spells List|Druid 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half (harmless); see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless); see text

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 263

You channel positive energy to cure 1d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +25) on each selected creature. Like other *cure* spells, *mass cure light wounds* deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them. Each affected undead may attempt a Will save for half damage.
